entities.name: PartyDirectoryReference
entities.description: Reference to a party in an external directory

attributes.name: party_directory_reference_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this reference

attributes.name: party_id
attributes.description: Foreign key to the Party entity

attributes.name: directory_name
attributes.description: Name of the external directory

attributes.name: directory_entry_id
attributes.description: ID of the party in the external directory

attributes.name: directory_entry_type
attributes.description: Type of entry in the directory

attributes.name: directory_entry_date
attributes.description: Date of the entry in the directory

attributes.name: directory_valid_period
attributes.description: Period for which the directory entry is valid

attributes.name: is_verified
attributes.description: Flag indicating if this reference has been verified

attributes.name: verification_date
attributes.description: Date when this reference was verified

attributes.name: verification_method
attributes.description: Method used to verify this reference

attributes.description: Date and time when this record was created
